TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CancellationToken extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 传播有关应取消操作的通知。

span.span: Propagates notification that operations should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A使线程，线程池工作项之间的协作取消或对象。A enables cooperative cancellation between threads, thread pool work items, or objects. 通过实例化创建取消标记从检索到的对象，它管理取消标记其属性。You create a cancellation token by instantiating a object, which manages cancellation tokens retrieved from its property. 然后将取消标记传递给任意数量的线程、 任务或应接收通知的取消的操作。You then pass the cancellation token to any number of threads, tasks, or operations that should receive notice of cancellation. 令牌不能用于启动取消。The token cannot be used to initiate cancellation. 当所属的对象调用、的取消标记每个副本上的属性设置为`true`。When the owning object calls , the property on every copy of the cancellation token is set to `true`. 接收通知的对象可以在任何方式适合进行响应。The objects that receive the notification can respond in whatever manner is appropriate. 有关更多的信息和代码示例，请参阅[托管线程中的取消](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information and code examples see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用的随机数生成器来模拟的数据集合应用程序从十一种不同检测读取 10 的整数值。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 零值指示度量值已失败的一个检测，应计算在这种情况下应取消操作和任何总体平均值。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 若要处理可能取消操作，该示例实例化对象，它生成的取消标记传递给的对象。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 对象反过来取消将标记传递到每个任务负责收集特定检测读数。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 调用方法来确保只有在所有读数已都收集了成功后，才计算平均值。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果某个任务具有不是它已被取消，因为调用方法引发异常。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool canceled) cil managed

span.span: The canceled state for the token.
Initializes the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的令牌将保留在指定的已取消状态`canceled`参数。Tokens created with this constructor will remain in the canceled state specified by the `canceled` parameter. 如果`canceled`是`false`，这两个和将`false`。If `canceled` is `false`, both and will be `false`. 如果`canceled`是`true`，这两个和将`true`。If `canceled` is `true`, both and will be `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanBeCanceled As Boolean
public: property bool CanBeCanceled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取此标记是否能处于已取消状态。

span.span: Gets whether this token is capable of being in the canceled state.

value.span: 如果此令牌能够处于已取消状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this token is capable of being in the canceled state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果返回`false`，保证，令牌将永远不会转换为已取消状态，这意味着，将永远不会返回`true`。If returns `false`, it is guaranteed that the token will never transition into a canceled state, meaning that will never return `true`. 无法取消的取消标记返回的静态属性。A cancellation token that cannot be canceled is returned by the static property. 你可以选择使用此属性来确定是否取消标记可以在检查前取消的值属性来确定是否已取消。You can optionally use this property to determine whether a cancellation token can be canceled before examing the value of the property to determine whether it has been canceled.

summary.span: 确定当前的 实例是否等于指定的标记。

span.span: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以下情况中的任何一个为 true，则两个取消标记相等：Two cancellation tokens are equal if any one of the following conditions is true: - 与相同的关联。They are associated with the same . - 它们由从公共构造函数，且其值是否相等。They were both constructed from public constructors, and their values are equal. - 这两个取消标记的值是。The value of both cancellation tokens is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCancellationRequested As Boolean
public: property bool IsCancellationRequested { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取是否已请求取消此标记。

span.span: Gets whether cancellation has been requested for this token.

value.span: 如果取消具有已请求此标记;否则为。

span.span: if cancellation has been requested for this token; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否已请求取消此令牌，通过令牌最初构造处于已取消状态，或通过调用上关联的标记的。This property indicates whether cancellation has been requested for this token, either through the token initially being constructed in a canceled state, or through calling on the token's associated . 如果此属性为`true`，它只保证已请求取消。If this property is `true`, it only guarantees that cancellation has been requested. 它不保证每个已注册的处理程序已完成执行，也不取消请求已完成传播到所有已注册处理程序。It does not guarantee that every registered handler has finished executing, nor that cancellation requests have finished propagating to all registered handlers. 尤其是在正在其中同时取消相关的对象的情况下，可能需要其他同步。Additional synchronization may be required, particularly in situations where related objects are being canceled concurrently. ## Examples 下面是一个简单的示例执行之前的服务器进程属性返回`true`。The following is a simple example that executes a server process until the property returns `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested/cs/cancellation.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested/vb/cancelthreads.vb#12)] 该示例实例化对象，控制对取消标记的访问。The example instantiates a object, which controls access to the cancellation token. 然后，它定义了两个线程过程。It then defines two thread procedures. 第一个定义为池键盘，并按下的"C"键时，调用的 lambda 表达式若要设置的取消标记为已取消状态。The first is defined as a lambda expression that pools the keyboard and, when the "C" key is pressed, calls to set the cancellation token to the cancelled state. 第二个是参数化的方法， `ServerClass.StaticMethod`，执行循环，直到属性是`true`。The second is a parameterized method, `ServerClass.StaticMethod`, that executes a loop until the property is `true`. 主线程然后启动两个线程和块，直到执行的线程`ServerClass.StaticMethod`方法终止。The main thread then starts the two threads and blocks until the thread that executes the `ServerClass.StaticMethod` method terminates.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As CancellationToken
public: static property System::Threading::CancellationToken None { System::Threading::CancellationToken get(); };

span.span: Returns an empty value.
An empty cancellation token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法取消此属性返回的取消标记;即，其属性是`false`。The cancellation token returned by this property cannot be canceled; that is, its property is `false`. 你还可以使用 C# [default(CancellationToken)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default.md)语句以创建一个空取消标记。You can also use the C# [default(CancellationToken)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default.md) statement to create an empty cancellation token. 两个空取消标记始终是相等的。Two empty cancellation tokens are always equal.

summary.span: 注册一个将在取消此 时调用的委托。

span.span: Registers a delegate that will be called when this is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration Register(class System.Action callback) cil managed
Public Function Register (callback As Action) As CancellationTokenRegistration

param.name: callback
param.span: 要在取消 时执行的委托。

span.span: The delegate to be executed when the is canceled.

summary.span: 注册一个将在取消此 时调用的委托。

span.span: Registers a delegate that will be called when this is canceled.

returns.span: 可用于注销回调的 实例。

span.span: The instance that can be used to unregister the callback.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此令牌已处于已取消状态，委托将立即，并以同步方式运行。If this token is already in the canceled state, the delegate will be run immediately and synchronously. 委托生成的任何异常将传播出去此方法调用。Any exception the delegate generates will be propagated out of this method call. 当前与委托一起被捕获，并将在执行它时使用。The current is captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 当前则不会捕获。The current is not captured.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此令牌已处于已取消状态，委托将立即，并以同步方式运行。If this token is already in the canceled state, the delegate will be run immediately and synchronously. 委托生成的任何异常将传播出去此方法调用。Any exception the delegate generates will be propagated out of this method call. 当前与委托一起被捕获，并将在执行它时使用。The current is captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 如果`useSynchronizationContext`是`true`，当前，分别存在、 是否还会捕获，以及委托和在执行它时将使用。If `useSynchronizationContext` is `true`, the current , if one exists, is also captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 否则为则不会捕获。Otherwise, is not captured.

summary.span: 如果已请求取消此标记，则引发 。

span.span: Throws a if this token has had cancellation requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供功能等效于：This method provides functionality equivalent to: C#C# ```csharp if (token.IsCancellationRequested) throw new OperationCanceledException(token); ``` ```vb If token.IsCancellationRequested Then Throw New OperationCanceledException(token) End If ```

span.span: The token has had cancellation requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问此属性会导致要实例化。Accessing this property causes a to be instantiated. 更可取的以便仅使用此属性，如有必要，从而然后释放关联尽早 （释放源将释放此分配的句柄） 的实例。It is preferable to only use this property when necessary, and to then dispose the associated instance at the earliest opportunity (disposing the source will dispose of this allocated handle). 不应关闭或直接释放句柄。The handle should not be closed or disposed directly.
